official_title: A Phase 2b Randomized, Double-blind, Active-and Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Induction and Maintenance Combination Therapy With Guselkumab and Golimumab in Participants With Moderately to Severely Active Crohn's Disease
inclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosis of Crohn's disease (CD) for at least 3 months prior to baseline
* Confirmed diagnosis of moderate to severe CD as assessed by Crohn'
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 65 Years
